mapper.select: SELECT registration_no registrationNo ,lecture_Name lectureName ,payment ,create_date createDate FROM registration WHERE student_id = #{studentId}

SELECT r.lecture_name lectureName ,r.registration_no registrationNo ,l.lecture_room_name lectureRoomName ,l.lec_phone lecPhone ,l.subject_name subjectName ,l.lec_cost lecCost ,l.difficulty difficulty ,l.registration_pass_score regiPassScore ,l.registration_number registrationNumber ,r.payment payment ,r.create_date createDate ,tt.begin_class beginClass ,tt.end_class endClass ,tt.start_time startTime ,tt.end_time endTime ,tt.lunch_time lunchTime ,t.teacher_name teacherName FROM registration r INNER JOIN lec l ON r.lecture_name = l.lecture_name INNER JOIN time_table tt ON l.lecture_name = tt.lecture_name INNER JOIN lec_plan lp ON lp.lecture_Name = r.lecture_Name INNER JOIN teacher t ON lp.teacher_id = t.teacher_id WHERE r.student_id= #{studentId} AND r.lecture_name = #{lectureName}
